title: Google: Malware abusing API is standard token theft, not an API issue
description: Google is downplaying reports of malware abusing an undocumented Google Chrome API to generate new authentication cookies when previously stolen ones have expired. [...]

title: X users fed up with constant stream of malicious crypto ads
description: Cybercriminals are abusing X advertisements to promote websites that lead to crypto drainers, fake airdrops, and other scams. [...]
